fields.value: The 2011 Debt Ceiling Controversy and the 2012 U.S. House Elections

dsDescriptionValue.value: This study provides preregistered information for a study of the 2012 election. The research design, list of matches, and all input variables were released before votes were counted in the 2012 election. Subsequently, the full replication data and software code were added to the study, as well as code for additional analyses suggested by reviewers.

files.description: Description of available data and code files, including a codebook for all variables contained in either data file.
files.label: codebookDebtCeiling.txt

dataFile.description: Description of available data and code files, including a codebook for all variables contained in either data file.

files.description: R code for estimating treatment effects with post-election data, using the matched data.
files.label: debtAnalysis.R

dataFile.description: R code for estimating treatment effects with post-election data, using the matched data.

files.description: Final post-election outcome data including certified vote shares from each state's Secretary of State.
files.label: debtCeilingCertified.tab

dataFile.description: Final post-election outcome data including certified vote shares from each state's Secretary of State.

files.description: Description of a registered research design that was publicly posted before the 2012 election. The design includes model specification, a complete list of matches, and information on data sources.
files.label: debtCeilingDesign.pdf

dataFile.description: Description of a registered research design that was publicly posted before the 2012 election. The design includes model specification, a complete list of matches, and information on data sources.

files.description: Treatment and covariate data that were recorded and uploaded prior to the counting of votes for the 2012 election.
files.label: debtCeilingPreOutcome.tab

dataFile.description: Treatment and covariate data that were recorded and uploaded prior to the counting of votes for the 2012 election.

files.description: R code for conducting coarsened exact matching to find matches both for all incumbents and for all incumbents in the general election. This code also estimates a multinomial probit model of intermediate outcomes for incumbents (contested election, uncontested election, losing primary, retirement, seeking higher office).
files.label: debtMatch.R

dataFile.description: R code for conducting coarsened exact matching to find matches both for all incumbents and for all incumbents in the general election. This code also estimates a multinomial probit model of intermediate outcomes for incumbents (contested election, uncontested election, losing primary, retirement, seeking higher office).

files.description: R code for implementing several reviewer suggestions for alternative analyses. All of these are reported in the online appendix.
files.label: debtSuggestions.R

dataFile.description: R code for implementing several reviewer suggestions for alternative analyses. All of these are reported in the online appendix.
